emails.title: Meeting next week
emails.content:
Hey Mike,

I have an update for you. Can we meet next week? I can meet on Monday and Wednesday. Please let me know when you are available.

-Shang

emails.title: CS 565 Announcement
emails.content:
Hi class,

A new assignment has been released.

Please check them out.

Cheers,
Minsuk

emails.title: Meeting tomorrow
emails.content:
Hey Mike,

Can we meet tomorrow sometime in the afternoon? Please let me know when works for you.

-Alex

emails.title: Important Announcement for CS 501
emails.content:
Hi everyone,

We will have no class tomorrow.

-Prof. Smith

emails.title: Update
emails.content:
Hi Mike,

I'd like to give you an update. We still need time to get back to you.

Let me know if there is any issue.

Best,
Priya
